titleHead: Enter contact details - Appeal a benefit decision - GOV.UK
title: Enter your contact details
subtitle: These will be used to send you information about your appeal.

error.required: Enter the first line of your address

error.invalid: You have entered an invalid character. Check your address and enter it again

error.required: Enter the town or city from your address
Enter the county from your address
Enter the postcode from your address
error.invalidPostcode: The online appeal service is not available to people from this region. This postcode should match the postcode you entered to access the service.

phoneNumber.title: Phone number (optional)
phoneNumber.hint: This may be used to contact you about your appeal

error.invalid: You have entered an invalid phone number. Check it and enter it again
